title: Bonus Episode: Special Guest - Remy Ma Talks Women In Rap + New Battle Rap League
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Remy Ma stepped up to Ebro in the Morning to have a great discussion and women rappers today, hyper-sexualization, how she feels more MC's can be highlighted or portrayed by others, success and more!

She also discussed stories of her own success and experiences she had throughout the years, and how "How The Way Up" relaunched her career! She also discusses her brand new Rap Battle League, Chrome23 and the upcoming Queens Get The Money event airing live on HOT 97.com Sunday, 2/27. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

description:
Remy Ma stepped up to Ebro in the Morning to have a great discussion and women rappers today, hyper-sexualization, how she feels more MC's can be highlighted or portrayed by others, success and more!

She also discussed stories of her own success and experiences she had throughout the years, and how "How The Way Up" relaunched her career! She also discusses her brand new Rap Battle League, Chrome23 and the upcoming Queens Get The Money event airing live on HOT 97.com Sunday, 2/27.
